experience.title: Front End Web Developer
experience.description: Multi channel marketing company that provided me the opportunity to grow on a Kanban team of 5 developers. Worked on all channels of the business building websites to facilitate marketing offers for magazines, products, and services with clients such as Spotify, eBay, Overstock, Ticketmaster, Delta, United, JetBlue and others.
experience.tech: React, Redux, Webpack, Angular 4+, Git, Gulp, SCSS, AWS S3, PayPal, Spotify OAuth, REST API, SQL, EJS.

experience.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experience.description: 9 to 5 bootcamp (that often went until 9pm) that taught fundamentals of full stack development. This course gave me a solid foundation from where my skills grew exponentionally. Through coding homework and weekly assignments, I was challenged to learn each and every second.
experience.tech: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Git, jQuery, Angular 1, Node.js, Ruby on Rails, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Heroku

experience.title: Head Swim Coach
experience.description: Coached various teams in New York, Ohio, and California. Ages of athletes ranged from 4 years to 24 years old with abilites from learning to swim, to competing at High School and NCAA Championship levels. During this time, I learned web development on my own using Free Code Camp and Code Academy while also managing a Wordpress site for one team I was coaching.
experience.tech: HTML, Javascript, CSS, Wordpress, Leadership, Marketing, Organization

experience.title: Student - Athlete
experience.description: 4 year varsity swimmer. Studied to become a swim coach. Took 4 semesters worth of Computer Science courses. Didn't realize it was a path I wanted to pursue until later.
experience.tech: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Java, Python, Communications, Pottery, Swimming

projects.title: Bizrate Offer Application
projects.description: Private and gated offer to sell magazines at a low price for the first term of issues. Payments can be processed through an internal API using Credit Cards or Paypal, powered by the Braintree API. I personally have spent the majority of my 2 year career at Synapse helping build, optimize, and maintain this application. It is the most stable and profitable part of the Synapse business. Survey Invitation Marketing Funnel .

projects.title: Mags for Miles
projects.technology: React, Redux, REST APIs, Gulp, Webpack, Puppeteer
projects.description: This homepage directs users to the direct mail and email campaigns for a program where users can use excess airline or hotel miles/points to subscribe to magazines. Choose a client to see the offer built on a separate React Application that manages the ecommerce logic for the magazine offers.

projects.title: Magazine Discount Center
projects.description: E-Commerce platform for purchasing individual magazines. Built on Angular frontend and Java backend.

projects.title: Stopwatch
projects.description: Small personal project I made in 2016 to aid my swim coaching career.
